name: Ride Your Own Wave
description: This animated piece honours the ones who dare to be themselves, embrace and build on their identity. Be proud, make a splash and ride your own wave! Celebrating Pride Month 2021, this animated piece brings to life an original photograph taken in The Castro, San Francisco in the early summer of 2018.  The number of minted pieces (111) is associated with spiritual awakening, accepting yourself in a new phase of your life that gives you a greater sense of self-worth and confidence.
